description: Developing Justice Sector Capacitues to promote legal Empowerment and Access to Justice

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description:
The main goal of the project is to promote legal empowerment and improve access to justice by supporting the newly established state Legal Aid Service (LAS) and NGOs and private attorneys who are providing legal aid to vulnerable groups.  This will be accomplished by:
a.	Assisting the LAS in expanding its services to reach national minority groups;
b.	Capacity development for the LAS to address significant changes in the criminal justice system and effectively manage Legal Aid Bureaus
c.	Support to the LAS for an awareness campaign in selected regions, with special emphasis on development of the capacity of the Legal Aid Bureaus conduct awareness campaigns; and
d.	Development of a strategic plan to promote access to justice and legal empowerment for vulnerable groups through the provision of full legal aid services on civil and administrative cases.
subproject.title: Legal Aid Service Support

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities of national human rights institutions
